summary: Adnan and Hicran are happily married however when their son die as a result of a mysterious accident Adanan becomes distant from his wife. Hicran starts investigating her past to see how it could connect to the death of her son.
cast: Bulut Akkale|Efsun Akkurt|Mana Alkoy|Acelya Alver|Ege Ariav|Ece Baykal|Sabir Irem Bölücek|Ilayda Eroglu|Reyhan Ilhan|Emre Kerem Ketenci|Ercan Koçak|Seda Oguz|Berat Efe Parlar|Ahmet Talay|Seyda Terzioglu|Kebire Tokur|Salih Usta|Yavuz Çetin
title: Siccin 2
